data.title: Welcome to The House of Fame!

entries.title: The Beginning
entries.caption: Our sims will compete to become a global superstar

entries.title: The Creative Circle
entries.caption: The cast will be spending most of their time honing their craft in the the creative circle

entries.title: The First Night
entries.caption: On the first night, action unfolds in the creative circle

entries.title: Painting the Town
entries.caption: Eloise and Sage's secret rendezvous in the creative circle is discovered

entries.title: Celebrity Sighting
entries.caption: Gavin hits the town and finds himself in the company of A-lister Thorne Blackwood

entries.title: Cassandra's Star
entries.caption: Cassandra earns a fame star from her paintings

entries.title: Nathaniel's Novels
entries.caption: Nathaniel self-publishes his first series of novels

entries.title: Gavin's Music
entries.caption: Gavin earns a star from his work as a musician

entries.title: Eloise's Makeover
entries.caption: Eloise goes on set to get into hair and makeup

entries.title: Eloise's Star
entries.caption: Eloise earns a star for her more edgy look

entries.title: Gavin's Music
entries.caption: Gavin earns a second star livestreaming his music

entries.title: Jasper v. Sage
entries.caption: Elimination ceremony

entries.title: Sage Eliminated
entries.caption: Sage screams obscenities as he is eliminated

entries.title: Jasper's First Star
entries.caption: Jasper earns his first star for his fitness

entries.title: Cassandra's Masterpiece
entries.caption: Cassandra earns a second star for her masterpiece

entries.title: The Divorce
entries.caption: Eloise and Nathaniel's marriage crumbles

entries.title: Apology Video
entries.caption: Eloise makes a tearful apology video

entries.title: First Kiss
entries.caption: Jasper and Gavin's first kiss

entries.title: Eloise's Elimination
entries.caption: Eloise is eliminated from the competition

entries.title: The Award Ceremony
entries.caption: The contestants gather for the award ceremony

entries.title: Cassandra's Third Star
entries.caption: Cassandra earns an award and another star for her masterpiece

entries.title: Gavin's Third Star
entries.caption: Gavin earns an award and another star for his love song about Jasper

entries.title: Nathaniel's Elimination
entries.caption: Nathaniel is eliminated from the competition

entries.title: Responding to the Drama
entries.caption: Cassandra respods to hate comments and earns a star

entries.title: Jasper's Goodbye Dinner
entries.caption: A goodbye dinner is hosted for Jasper

entries.title: The Proposal
entries.caption: Jasper proposes to Gavin

entries.title: The Winner
entries.caption: Cassandra wins the final star doing a 24 hour chairty stream
